data.text:
Publish date: 2024-06-12

Tommy Savas is a well-known multitalented American actor and producer. In addition, he has appeared in a number of films and television series, including Roger Dodger, Seven Days, and Extra Butter, Please. Savas became well-known for his appearances in State of Affairs, Bad Roomies, and The Last Ship. Luv U Cuz, his most recent effort, was published as an animated short film in 2021.

Quick Facts

Real NameTommy SavasNick NameTommyDate Of BirthDecember 20, 1984Age38 years oldBirthplaceHarlem, New YorkNationalityAmericanProfessionActorHeight6 feet 5 inchesWeight65 kgHair ColorBlackEye colorBrownNet Worth$1.5 million

Lynn Keganâs Age & Early Life

Tommy A. Savas was born in Harlem, New York, on December 20, 1984. Savas is an American citizen of Caucasian descent. Born in Harlem, he was raised in Cresskill, New Jersey. Tommy Savas is the youngest of four children, and he has not revealed his siblingsâ identities to the public. He has always been interested in performance and theater since he was a child. He has also refused to reveal the names or professions of his biological parents to the public. Despite the fact that no information about his grandparentsâ identities is accessible, his grandfather participated in WWII.

Tommy Savas has not disclosed the name of his college. Although little is known about his upbringing, he has been studying improv and acting with Susan Dias Karnovsky since he was six years old. Since he was a toddler, Tommy has been in commercials, HBO, and PBS childrenâs programs. In addition to his coursework and soccer activities, he studies privately with Joseph Daly and at HB Studios in New York with Trudi Stible. He divided his time between New York and Los Angeles, where he studied acting with Robert Lyons and Lynette McNeil and comedy with Shari Shaw. Savas continued to hone his acting skills by appearing in local theater productions and sketch comedy at New Yorkâs HA! Comedy Club.

Lynn Kegan Height & Weight

Tommy Savas is 6 foot 5 inches tall. He has also refused to provide the media with his hip, waist, and bicep measurements. He has kept these measures hidden from the media. Perhaps he is cautious to reveal his shoe and outfit sizes to the press. He has maintained his physique in excellent form, and he looks to have black hair and brown eyes from the outside.

Lynn Keganâs Net Worth

How much is Lynn Keganâs net worth? Tommy Savas is a $1.5 million net-worth American television actor as of August 2023. His annual income and property value, which includes property, houses, and other assets, have yet to be released, according to the source. He has not disclosed the total amount.

Career

Tommy Savas began doing commercials at the age of six, but his big break came at the age of 15 when he was picked out of 15000 actors to play Xavierin in the iconic HBO series The Sopranos. He was then featured in Law & Order: Special Victims Unit after this series. After graduating from high school, he moved to Los Angeles to pursue his career, and he was quickly cast in a guest role in Cold Case, Without a Trace, Shark, The New Adventures of Old Christine, General Hospital, and many more series.

Tommy may also be seen in national commercials for businesses including Gillette, Nesquik, Guitar Hero, Pizza Hut, and Subway. In 2009, he formed Reckless Tortuga with a few friends as a method to keep making things and working even when they werenât being paid. Reckless Tortuga is a popular web-based comedy channel on YouTube, where he also plays Damian in the video series The Online Gamer. In 2014, Savas participated in The Last Ship and the NBC drama State of Affairs. The next year, he co-wrote and co-starred with Patrick Renna in the dark comedy Bad Roomies. He was cast in the ABC comedy pilot The Fluffy Shop, written by Gavriel Iglesias, in 2016.

Lynn Kegan Girlfriend & Dating

Who is Lynn Keganâs girlfriend? Tommy Savas is in a romantic relationship. Tommy is involved with Angie Simms. According to the number of photographs they have shared on Instagram, this pair looks to be in a relationship. However, there is no information on how and where they first met and fell in love. He has also shared many photos of her spending quality time with him. He just posted a photo of her wishing her a happy birthday, as well as a video of a nice moment they had, implying that they are in a relationship.
